Settings.description: Canister settings, such as compute and memory allocation.

compute_allocation.description: Compute allocation (0 to 100). Represents guaranteed compute capacity.

environment_variables.description: Environment variables for the canister as key-value pairs. These variables are accessible within the canister and can be used to configure behavior without hardcoding values in the WASM module.

freezing_threshold.description: Freezing threshold in seconds. Controls how long a canister can be inactive before being frozen.

memory_allocation.description: Memory allocation in bytes. If unset, memory is allocated dynamically.

reserved_cycles_limit.description: Reserved cycles limit. If set, the canister cannot consume more than this many cycles.

wasm_memory_limit.description: Wasm memory limit in bytes. Sets an upper bound for Wasm heap growth.

wasm_memory_threshold.description: Wasm memory threshold in bytes. Triggers a callback when exceeded.

canisters.description: An optional list of the canisters to be included in this environments. Defaults to all the canisters if not specified.

network.description: The target network for canister deployment. Defaults to the `local` network if not specified

settings.description: Override the canister settings for this environment
